Starters.name: Foie Gras Duo
Starters.desc: A delicate pairing of seared foie gras and a velvety foie gras mousse, accompanied by a spiced fig compote and toasted brioche.

Starters.name: Truffle Carpaccio
Starters.desc: Paper-thin slices of prime beef tenderloin drizzled with truffle-infused olive oil, shaved Parmesan, arugula, and caper berries.

Starters.name: Oysters Rockefeller
Starters.desc: Freshly shucked oysters topped with a rich blend of spinach, Pernod-infused cream, and crispy bacon, baked to perfection.

Starters.name: Tuna Tartare
Starters.desc: Sushi-grade tuna diced and seasoned with soy, sesame, and fresh herbs, served with avocado puree and crispy wonton chips.

Steak.name: Dry-Aged Ribeye
Steak.desc: A beautifully marbled 16 oz. dry-aged ribeye, perfectly grilled to your preference and served with truffle-infused mashed potatoes and bordelaise sauce.

Steak.name: Filet Mignon au Poivre
Steak.desc: A tender 8 oz. filet mignon crusted with crushed peppercorns, pan-seared, and finished with a Cognac cream sauce, accompanied by haricots verts almondine.

Steak.name: Tomahawk Steak
Steak.desc: A show-stopping 32 oz. bone-in ribeye, expertly seasoned and char-grilled, served with roasted garlic mashed potatoes and roasted seasonal vegetables.

Seafood.name: Lobster Thermidor
Seafood.desc: A succulent lobster tail poached and then broiled with a luscious blend of shallots, mushrooms, brandy, and Gruyere cheese, accompanied by saffron risotto.

Seafood.name: Pan-Seared Chilean Sea Bass
Seafood.desc: A buttery and flaky Chilean sea bass fillet pan-seared to perfection, served over a bed of lemon-scented risotto and sautéed baby spinach.

Seafood.name: Grilled Salmon Provencal
Seafood.desc: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled and topped with a medley of tomatoes, olives, capers, and fresh herbs, served with garlic mashed potatoes.

Sides.name: Truffle Mac and Cheese
Sides.desc: Cavatappi pasta in a creamy truffle-infused cheese sauce, topped with a crispy panko crust.

Sides.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
Sides.desc: Brussels sprouts roasted with bacon, shallots, and balsamic glaze, offering a balance of sweet and savory flavors.

Sides.name: Loaded Twice-Baked Potato
Sides.desc: A fluffy baked potato whipped with butter, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and crispy bacon bits.

Sides.name: Grilled Asparagus
Sides.desc: Tender asparagus spears grilled to perfection and drizzled with lemon-infused olive oil.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Decadence
Desserts.desc: A rich flourless chocolate cake served with a raspberry coulis and a scoop of vanilla bean gelato.

Desserts.name: Crème Brûlée Trio
Desserts.desc: A flight of classic vanilla, coffee, and Grand Marnier-infused crème brûlées, each with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust.

Desserts.name: Tiramisu
Desserts.desc: A traditional Italian dessert featuring layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

Desserts.name: Molten Lava Cake
Desserts.desc: A warm chocolate lava cake with a gooey molten center, accompanied by a scoop of salted caramel gelato.
